steps.instruction: Preheat Oven.  Chop Butternut squash (1cm cubes), place on tray with oil, salt, pepper and 1/2 tablespoon curry powder.  Roast the squash
Slice onion, chop tomatoes into 2cm chunks, roughly chop the corriander
Boil 50ml of water.  Heat splash of oil in a saucepan, add 1/2 tablespoon of curry powder.
Add tomatoes and cook for 1 min
Add water, veg stock and 200ml coconut milk
Add lentils to the saucepan and simmer
Fry the onions in a frying pan
Warm naan bread in the oven
